availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Tarrents (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Tarrents. Father of Elizabeth A. Tarrents, Susan J. Tarrents, William E. Tarrents, and Thomas T. Tarrents, Mary C. Tarrents, and Sarah F. Tarrents. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Employed John L. Smithson as a farm laborer in Simpson County in 1860. Farmer in Simpson County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 46B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 5.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Simpson County, KY, February 1864, p. 151.
